item.title: Tallow Balm vs Most Popular Moisturisers: Which One Works Best?
item.description: Tallow Balm vs Most Popular Moisturisers: Which One Works Best? With so many moisturisers available, choosing the right one can be overwhelming. Many people stick to big-brand lotions without realising how tallow balm NZ compares in terms of ingredients, effectiveness, and skin benefits. 1. What’s in Your Moisturiser? Most store-bought moisturisers contain: ❌ Petroleum-based ingredients (mineral oil, paraffin) – Forms a barrier but doesn’t truly hydrate. ❌ Synthetic preservatives & parabens – Linked to skin irritation.
